Name: Tree
Description: Allow you to display your association in a Tree Map

Options.Description: Use expert mode on Evolve to generate this string
list the scriptname of the objectType and the popOut
Horizontal Spacing Factor * nbr Char + Horizontal Offset = distance between node of the tree, usually 20 is good value
Horizontal Spacing Factor * nbr Char + Horizontal Offset = distance between node of the tree, usually 6 is good value
